player_text: what's your name, why are you here

output.narration: The merchant looks up from arranging jars of dried herbs on a rough-hewn counter. Her eyes are sharp but not unkind, sizing you up with the practiced glance of someone used to judging both coin and character.

npc_dialogue.text: Name's Mara. I'm here because this shop feeds meâ€”and anyone else with copper in their pocket and sense enough to spend it well.

output.memory_summary: Player asked Mara her name and purpose; she introduced herself as a practical merchant running a shop.
